name: WebUI
description: Class for spawning a dynamic Web Browser.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Used for debugging logs

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Web URL or HTML File Path as file://my_file.html

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: if WebUI is visible on screen

parameters.name: is_transparent
parameters.description: if WebUI background is transparent

parameters.name: auto_resize
parameters.description: if should auto resize when screen changes it's size (useful OFF when you are painting meshes with WebUI)

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: size of the WebUI width when you are not using auto_resize

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: size of the WebUI height when you are not using auto_resize

functions.name: BringToFront
functions.description: Puts this WebUI in the front of all WebUIs and Widgets

functions.name: CallEvent
functions.description: Calls an Event on the Browser's JavaScript

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The Event Name to trigger the event

parameters.name: args...
parameters.description: Arguments to pass to the event

functions.name: LoadURL
functions.description: Loads a new File/URL in this Browser

functions.name: LoadHTML
functions.description: Loads a pure HTML in this Browser

functions.name: GetName
functions.description: Gets this WebUI name

functions.name: ExecuteJavaScript
functions.description: Executes a JavaScript code in the Browser
functions.description_long:
Executes a JavaScript code in the Browser
Note: This method is experimental and should be used cautiously. Events are still the preferred way of communicating between Packages and WebUI.

functions.name: SetFocus
functions.description: Enables the focus on this browser (i.e. can receive Keyboard input and will trigger input events)
functions.description_long:
Enables the focus on this browser (i.e. can receive Keyboard input and will trigger input events
Note: Only one browser can have focus per time.

functions.name: RemoveFocus
functions.description: Removes the focus from this WebUI (and sets it back to game viewport)
functions.description_long:
Removes the focus from this WebUI (and sets it back to game viewport)
You MUST call this after you don't need keyboard input anymore

functions.name: SetLayout
functions.description: Sets the Layout as Canvas on Screen
functions.description_long: Sets the Layout as Canvas on Screen. Anchors:

functions.name: SetFreeze
functions.description: Freezes the WebUI Rendering to the surface (it will still execute the JS under the hood)

functions.name: SetVisibility
functions.description: Sets the visibility in screen

functions.name: SpawnSound
functions.description: Spawns a Sound entity to plays this WebUI sound

functions.name: SendMouseWheelEvent
functions.description: Sends a Mouse Event into the WebUI programmatically

parameters.name: mouse_x
parameters.description: Position X of the mouse

parameters.name: mouse_y
parameters.description: Position Y of the mouse

functions.name: SendKeyEvent
functions.description: Sends a Key Event into the WebUI programmatically

parameters.name: modifiers
parameters.description: Supports several modifiers separating by | (using bit-wise operations)

functions.name: SendMouseMoveEvent
functions.description: Sends a Mouse Move Event into the WebUI programmatically

parameters.name: mouse_x
parameters.description: Position X of the mouse

parameters.name: mouse_y
parameters.description: Position Y of the mouse

parameters.name: modifiers
parameters.description: Supports several modifiers separating by | (using bit-wise operations)

functions.name: SendMouseClickEvent
functions.description: Sends a Mouse Click into the WebUI programmatically
functions.description_long: You must send both Down and Up to make it work properly

parameters.name: mouse_x
parameters.description: Position X of the mouse

parameters.name: mouse_y
parameters.description: Position Y of the mouse

parameters.name: mouse_type
parameters.description: Which mouse button

parameters.name: is_mouse_up
parameters.description: Whether the event was up or down

parameters.name: modifiers
parameters.description: Supports several modifiers separating by | (using bit-wise operations)

parameters.name: click_count
parameters.description: Use 2 for double click event

functions.name: GetSize
functions.description: Gets the current size of this WebUI

functions.name: GetVisibility
functions.description: Returns the current WebUI visibility

functions.name: IsFrozen
functions.description: Returns if this WebUI is currently frozen

functions.name: OpenDevTools
functions.description: Opens the Developer Tools for this WebUI, it only works if the Client.SetDebugEnabled() was not disabled

functions.name: CloseDevTools
functions.description: Closes the Developer Tools for this WebUI, it only works if the Client.SetDebugEnabled() not disabled

events.name: Fail
events.description: Triggered when this page fails to load

events.name: Ready
events.description: Triggered when this page is fully loaded
